changelog.md.Pour rappel s'il n'y a pas d'information: As a reminder if there is no information on the update, it means that it only concerns the updating of documentation, translation or text
changelog.md.Support du pulseUP et pulseDOWN pour la: PulseUP and pulseDOWN support for BSO blade management
changelog.md.Correction d'un bug sur la lecture de la: Correction of a bug on reading the value of the 0-10v extension
changelog.md.Correciton d'une erreur dans l'url d'eve: Correction of an error in the event url to give to the ipx800
changelog.md.Ajout d'un systeme de sauvegarde automat: Addition of an automatic daily backup system for GCE_IPX800V5
changelog.md.Support PWM en mono-couleur uniquement: PWM support in single color only
changelog.md.Suppression du redemarrage du démon a ch: Suppression of the restarting of the daemon at each change on the equipment (it is now necessary when you modify an equipment to restart the daemon manually
changelog.md.Correction des numéros pour les capteurs: Number correction for enOcean Analog sensors
changelog.md.Ajout du X-dimmer (ne pas oublier sur la: Adding the X-dimmer (don't forget to configure the check plugin G for x-dimmer requests
changelog.md.Ajout d'option sur les demandes à l'ipx8: Addition of option on requests to the ipx800 (possibility of selecting the type of request to reduce the load
changelog.md.Correction de bugs sur la récuperération: Correction of bugs on the recovery of information from
changelog.md.Optimisation de la synchronisation avec: Optimization of synchronization with the ipx800
changelog.md.Ajout d'un moteur de template pour la gé: Addition of a template engine for order generation

index.md.Ce plugin permet de gérer un IPX 800 v4: This plugin allows you to manage an IPX 800 v4
index.md.Après téléchargement du plugin, il vous: After downloading the plugin, you just need to activate it and check the boxes that apply to you for requests to GCE_IPX800V5 (example check X-Dimmer if you have an X-dimmer
index.md.Vous pouvez aussi choisir la fréquence d: You can also choose the frequency of requests to lighten the load on GCE_IPX800V5
index.md.Après chaque modidfication de la fréquen: After each modification of the frequency or requests you have to restart the daemon so that it is taken into account
index.md.Pour alleger la charge il est recommande: To lighten the load, it is recommended to uncheck ALL type requests and just check the APIs that concern you (you will find details in the API documentation for GCE_IPX800V5
index.md.Vous pouvez voir sur cette page l'état d: You can see on this page the status of the daemon monitoring the IPX800
index.md.La configuration des équipements IPX800: The configuration of IPX800 devices is accessible from the menu
index.md.Vous retrouvez ici toute la configuratio: Here you find all the configuration of your equipment
index.md.indique l'objet parent auquel appartient: indicates the parent object to which the equipment belongs
index.md.rend votre équipement visible sur le das: makes your equipment visible on the dashboard
index.md.les catégories de l'équipement (il peut: equipment categories (it can belong to several categories
index.md.clef api de l'IPX800 (par default la cle: API key of the IPX800 (by default the API key is apikey
index.md.Le plugin par defaut ne creer rien, ca s: The default plugin does not create anything, it will be up to you to do so by
index.md.fonction de votre configuration, mais vo: depending on your configuration but you will be guide
index.md.Vous avez les types d'action: You have the types of action
index.md.permet de mettre à 1 une sortie (ou entr: allows you to set an output (or virtual input) to 1, or to assign a value to an analog input (or counter
index.md.permet de mettre à 0 une sortie (ou entr: allows to set to 0 an output (or virtual input
index.md.permet d'inverser l'état d'une sortie (o: allows to reverse the state of an output (or virtual input
index.md.Vous avez les types d'actionneurs: You have the types of actuators
index.md.Certain type d'actionneur peuvent etre m: Certain type of actuator can be hidden depending on the type of action
index.md.Ensuite en fonction du type d'action et: Then depending on the type of action and the actuator you have several parameters which can be
index.md.numéro de l'entrée analogique et valeur: analog input number and value to assign (leave blank if you want to choose with the slider
index.md.numéro du fil pilote ainsi que valeur de: pilot wire number and order value (0 comfort, 1 eco, 2 frost-free, 3 off, 4 comfort-1, 5 comfort-2
index.md.Vous avez les types differents (en fonct: You have different types (depending on your extensions
index.md.option sous la forme 1-3 pour le volet 3: option in form 1-3 for part 3 of extension VR 1
index.md.sous la forme 1-TEMP pour la température: in the form 1-TEMP for the temperature of the sensor 1, 3-HUM for the humidity of the sensor 3 or 2-LUM for the brightness of the sensor 2
index.md.Pour chaque type jeedom vous demandera l: For each type jeedom will ask you the number of the desired information
index.md.Push des informations de l'IPX vers Jeed: Push information from IPX to Jeedom
index.md.Pour eviter de faire un refresh des info: To avoid making information refresh in Jeedom or too frequent interrogations (which can harm the ipx800) it is possible to ask the IPX800 to push the information towards Jeedom (attention it is not possible for all input / output types
index.md.Voici la syntaxe à utiliser dans un push: Here is the syntax to use in an IPX push to
index.md.qui prend la référence de la valeur à en: which takes the reference of the value to send on the IPX (for example
index.md.Ensuite il vous faire une scene par type: Then it will make you a scene by type (entry, relay ...) with
index.md.et choisir le type voulu (par exemple So: and choose the desired type (for example Physical outputs
index.md.et choisir le push correspondant (par ex: and choose the corresponding push (for example Jeedom Relais
index.md.Pour vous aider il y a un template qui p: To help you there is a template that allows you to create certain types of orders at once and faster
